website_summaries.verdict: If you prefer your burgers on the meatless side, this option is eco-friendly, inexpensive, and literally green.
pros: Geared toward vegetarians, although it can be used for meat, as well
The press is made from eco-friendly material, as is the packaging
Makes 5-inch patties and stuffed burgers, or 2.7-inch sliders
Video tutorial and e-cookbook available after purchase
cons: Very little in the way of included instructions, although it does point to the video and eBook

customer_reviews.title: Size is not as it seems
customer_reviews.text: In the description it states the size is 5" well while that may be the over all measurement the size for the patty itself is ONLY 4 INCHES!! after reading the reviews I was under the impression that the patty was 5 inches! I would NOT have purchased if they would have stated the CORRECT SIZE! Don't be fooled!
customer_reviews.author: ROWDEY

customer_reviews.title: Too big. Too messy.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this more than I do. I was excited to try some recipes out with a burger press. It's too big. All the recipes I have don't make burgers this big, and the slider option is too small. The burger mix sticks to the press way too much. I had to use a ton of olive oil to make sure they didn't stick. Too big. Too messy. Not that big of a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: User instructions missing
customer_reviews.text: Would have been a nice touch to have some user instructions included. I found a YouTube clip that showed me how, but there was not any mention of that or of any internet site to go to in the product packaging. You get the green plastic press in a clear plastic bag in a light cardboard box along with a few patty separator discs for storage.
customer_reviews.author: MnMike

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need for the lowest price
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple device, so I just ordered the cheapest one I could find and this works great. I didn't need the wax paper, the patties popped out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Hammond

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tool for making veggie burgers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for making veggie burgers, which can be tough to form and keep consistent. I haven't tried using the stuffing part yet, but it also looks like a good tool. The recipe booklet has some interesting recipes, but definitely not vegan. Most of the burger recipes have eggs, cheese, and other non vegan ingredients. Vegans can adapt the recipes for sure. All in all a good tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Making same size hamburgers is easy for cooking now
customer_reviews.text: Making same size hamburgers is easy for cooking now. You can make your own stuffed hamburgers for a lot less than buying them pre made. And you can stuff them with whatever you want. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: ladywolf

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected! but no ebook link :(
customer_reviews.text: I only used it with meat and worked very well 2nd review. I didn't get the link for the ebook with instructions . Thought that part of the price included beeing able to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: super simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Well made burger press! Took me a minute to figure it out (no instructions). They should put the video in the description, super simple to use. Made perfect veggie burgers.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: After looking over all available options I chose this one. Works great and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: Burger press
customer_reviews.text: Great product, makes easy burger patties for cooking or freezing. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: JUST MADE SOME VEGGIE BURGERS. I LOVE IT. . IT MAKES LIFE SO MUCH EASIER. . MY BURGERS ARE SHAPED VERY WELL
customer_reviews.author: LATONYA TOOMER

customer_reviews.title: Must have in every kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Wow such a life saver! I make burgers at least once a week and for many people ! It definelty made the cooking process much faster and easier to use :) it’s also child friendly !
customer_reviews.author: mila

customer_reviews.title: You have to buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product! I use it every day. It is good not only for veggie burgers but also for meat burgers. arrived fast. a must-have in every kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Shai Kivity

customer_reviews.title: Works but uses makes patties too large
customer_reviews.text: I like to use ball park size buns. These patties are too large. I am full 1/2 way through eating 1 burger. It does work to make the burger patty. If you like 1/2 pound burgers this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really excited that there’s something like this that exists
customer_reviews.text: Really excited that there’s something like this that exists! Really made making my veggie and meat burgers more solid and presentable
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R

customer_reviews.title: Functional and we'll made and designed
customer_reviews.text: Makes nice burgers, just a little bit too small for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tsikusr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean & makes the perfect size patties or breakfast patties for muffins!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Easy to use, easy to clean. Exactly what I was looking for and the price was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! I have checked several alternatives and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I have checked several alternatives and this is definitely the best Burger Press on the market. Absolutely loved how simple it is and intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: hamutal posklinsky

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with instructions. E book with recipes of no use to those without a printer,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product several times now, used for both pork and sausage. No real issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product made it easy for me to make my burgers (without too much ...
customer_reviews.text: The product made it easy for me to make my burgers (without too much mess). Recomended for the homemade makers!
customer_reviews.author: Itai Zlotnik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Making burgers is so much easier. A prefect burger patty with what ever toppings you want in it.
customer_reviews.author: WinnieB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, finally I can be more creative with my veggie food! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Reitblat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Made meat burgers with a pinterest recipe for Fuddruckers seasoning. What a fun and helpful gadget!! Thank you for including video instructions and recipes.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Good value for $!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Very useful for making fresh and delicious hamburgers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love making stuff burgers with this
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and makes stuff burgers with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant! So easy to use, and delicious. Would definitely recommend one to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Shir Abramov

customer_reviews.title: Great veggie press at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This press makes it very easy to make beautiful veggie patties. It's both compact and versatile. The parts are made out of a durable and hard BPA-free plastic that I expect will withstand many uses and washes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it so much and I use it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it so much and I use it a lot. It is very simple to use and good for vegetarian burgers and meet burgers.
customer_reviews.author: Itamar Levi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and gets the job done easily and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Green not teal
customer_reviews.text: Only giving it one star because I was expecting it to be real not green. Works great other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Contreras Family

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to clean. Gives you the perfect template to make home made burgers. The recipe e-book is great! Gave me a ton off great ideas for meals.
customer_reviews.author: kira

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Quick
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Quick, easy to clean and easy to use! Really great deal for the price, I use it quite regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Soovadeep

customer_reviews.title: Cool little product that does a lot for very little
customer_reviews.text: This is something I didn't know I needed till I bought it, its great! I always buy bulk ground beef and this makes it so easy to create burgers that are perfect. I added onions and vegetables too and creates a great little paddie. I would recommend you pick one up considering the price and how easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Lopilato

product_meta.title: GreenBeat Stuffed Burger Press | 15 Vegetarian Recipes eBook | 30 Wax Papers - Hamburger Grill Accessories
product_meta.description:
Get Ready For Some Chef-Like Dazzling Results!
There are plenty of techniques and secrets to upgrade your home cooking.
Working with the best tools is a great way to start.
This kit is perfect for veggie burger lovers that want to combine some flavor
and style into their patties.


Perfect Veggie Burgers Only One Press Away
Our burger set is designed for optimal convenience and ease of use while maintaining
high-performance levels. The innovative burger press design,
allows you to create different burger types to fit any mood or event.
Either Classic, Stuffed, or Mini Burgers, it will definitely spice up your kitchen.


Good Nutrition Is Our Mission
We want to help you stay healthy without compromising taste.
We’ve composed a vegetarian recipe E-Book that contains 15 delicious veggie
burger recipes to make sure you never run out of creative ideas.
Our recipe book will definitely help you know your veggies


High Quality Eco-Friendly Materials
We want to protect our planet through our products and coexist with nature
without compromising on quality & taste. We believe environmental awareness is
essential as much as producing the perfect product. This is why our designed
package is made of eco-friendly recycled materials and the entire production
process is handled with respect towards the environment.
feature_bullets: ✓ THE PERFECT BURGER MAKER – GreenBeat burger maker kit, allows you to create delicious, beautiful and professional burgers consisting of different patty types. 3 features within 1 single device! Whether classic, stuffed, or mini sliders, get ready for some chef-like results that will boost your home-made burgers to the next level. This hamburger making tool cooking accessory gets the perfect veggie burger every single time!

✓ EASY TO CLEAN AND USE – Our hamburger press patty maker is designed for optimal convenience and ease of use. It is lightweight, has nonstick coating, and dishwasher safe, making it the most useful kitchen tool to keep when making patties. We’ve composed a video instruction tutorial to make the process of making your home made stuffed burgers even easier.

✓ PREMIUM ECO-FRIENDLY MATERIAL – Made of heavy duty, durable, 100% BPA-free, nonstick plastic food grade material, the grill press is safe as much as easy to use. The entire production process is handled with respect towards the environment. The stuffed veggie burger press is packed in a designed brown box, made of eco-friendly recycled material.

✓ RECIPE EBOOK + WAX PAPERS – Who said that a healthy diet means boring food? We want to help you be healthy without compromising taste so we’ve composed a vegetarian recipe e-book that contains 15 delicious veggie burger recipes to make sure you never run out of creative ideas. For best results, a pack of high quality patty papers is included. The non-stick patty paper makes sure your burger mold will not get stuck around the edges after you press it!

✓ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED. Love it - or your money back! We are positive that you will love your new burger making kit. If not, simply let us know and we'll process a FULL REFUND immediately or compensate you with a new kit
